subject: Re: [EVP-ITC] Just the chamber and speaker
author: SnowfireL@aol.com
full_text:
----------MB_8CCEE72991932C9_1070_1356B_webmail-d100.sysops.aol.com
Content-Transfer-Encoding: quoted-printable
Content-Type: text/plain; charset="utf-8"

 It's going to sound silly to you Frank, but I still have my old spirit tru=
mpet, it's about 60 or more years old now, i got it from a man that made th=
em back in the heydays for spiritualism, it would sit in the middle of a ro=
om, where people sat for seance, and it would take the energy of the people=
 and from the medium, and a glass of water was in the room and fly about, a=
nd get direct spirit voice, it's said, that at one time spirit was able to =
some how form these "spiritual vocal cords" inside the trumpet pipe, and ta=
lk.=C2=A0 I know, it sounds crazy, but it did use to happen, and it was not=
 a gimmick, Trumpets are made of a hard aluminum pipe light weight long tub=
e, i have a picture of it if you'd like to see it, maybe it's the same type=
 principle=C2=A0 your using in the box. sf 


-----Original Message-----
Fr=
om: Frank Sumption <purplealiengirl@...>
To: EVP-ITC@yahoogroup=
s.com
Sent: Sat, Jul 10, 2010 1:56 pm
Subject: Re: [EVP-ITC] Just the chamb=
er and speaker

          =C2=A0                                  
=C2=A0Wh=
en I first "got" the idea for the box, using a chamber was poionted out to =
me kinda telepathicly. It seems to function as a space where the sound can =
be manipulated easier by the entities, and using different materials seems =
to get different levels. When I use aluminum, that seems to facilitate ET c=
ontact more often than not using the chamber. Using pipe helps make the cha=
mbers smaller. Thre seems to be a filtering effect by the chamber that tend=
s to enhance the voices. Most of the boxes I make have an option to use the=
 chambers. 
  =C2=A0
 =C2=A0The mind contact that poined out the chamber--I=
 think--was that shadow guy on the group home page. 
 =C2=A0
 =C2=A0F-S


 =
On Sat, Jul 10, 2010 at 12:30 AM, <SnowfireL@...> wrote:
  =C2=A0=
      Frank, do those pipes lessen the static a bit?=C2=A0 What is it used =
for?
  =C2=A0
  In a message dated 7/10/2010 2:15:19 A.M. Eastern Daylight =
Time, purplealiengirl@... writes:
 =C2=A0    
=C2=A0The small hole is=
 for the mic. At 7 seconds "smoking and you stay right here". Smoke for 35 =
years and even after five or six or whatever it's been years of not smoking=
, it still crosses my mind from time to time, and this is the imediate resp=
onse. 
  =C2=A0
 =C2=A0F-S
 
 





 





 


 




 
                    =

<div style=3D"font-family: arial; color: black; font-size: 10pt;"> It's go=
ing to sound silly to you Frank, but I still have my old spirit trumpet, it=
's about 60 or more years old now, i got it from a man that made them back =
in the heydays for spiritualism, it would sit in the middle of a room, wher=
e people sat for seance, and it would take the energy of the people and fro=
m the medium, and a glass of water was in the room and fly about, and get d=
irect spirit voice, it's said, that at one time spirit was able to some how=
 form these "spiritual vocal cords" inside the trumpet pipe, and talk.&nbsp=
; I know, it sounds crazy, but it did use to happen, and it was not a gimmi=
ck, Trumpets are made of a hard aluminum pipe light weight long tube, i hav=
e a picture of it if you'd like to see it, maybe it's the same type princip=
le  your using in the box. sf </div>

<div><br>
</div>

<div> When I first "got" =
the idea for the box, using a chamber was poionted out to me kinda telepath=
icly. It seems to function as a space where the sound can be manipulated ea=
sier by the entities, and using different materials seems to get different =
levels. When I use aluminum, that seems to facilitate ET contact more often=
 than not using the chamber. Using pipe helps make the chambers smaller. Th=
re seems to be a filtering effect by the chamber that tends to enhance the =
voices. Most of the boxes I make have an option to use the chambers. </div>=

  
<div> </div>
 
<div> The mind contact that poined out the cha=
mber--I think--was that shadow guy on the group home page. </div>
 
<div>&n=
bsp;</div>
 
<div> F-S<br>
<br>
</div>
